intro: The mist is alive. It sees you. It hears you. It waits.
description:
You awaken in a desolate, forsaken place. A thick, eerie mist surrounds you, shrouding the crumbling buildings ahead. The air is heavy with abandonment… yet an unseen presence watches you from the shadows.
With every passing moment, the unease deepens. The mist is not just a natural phenomenon—it moves, it shifts, it follows. At times, it hides you. Other times, it hides something far worse.
Your memory is fragmented, offering no answers as to how you arrived here. The only clues lie in scattered notes and the unsettling sounds that beckon you further into the unknown.

About Game:
	•	Explore a decayed, forgotten world filled with mysteries and lurking horrors.
	•	Struggle to survive in a hostile environment where resources are scarce.
	•	Rely on stealth—sometimes, escape is your only option.

Unravel the secrets of the mist and the truth behind your lost memories.
	•	Experience psychological horror with reality distortions, auditory hallucinations, and shifting environments.
	•	Dynamic Mist: More than an atmosphere—it observes, manipulates, and controls what you perceive.
	•	Unseen Threats: Not all dangers are visible—sometimes, you only feel their presence.

Silent Mist is not just a horror game. It is a descent into fear, isolation, and the secrets that should have remained lost in the fog.
